name: SuperCircuits
description:
Please Play in Fullscreen and DO NOT PRESS QUIT ON WEBGL!

Welcome to SuperCircuits, a game where you connect chips together to connect the circuit and bring power to the light bulb!

How to Play:

You start at the Green Chip, which has a certain amount of voltage. Then you go around, clicking the chips around the green chip to connect the two, that gray chips power will then be added to the green chips power. The goal is to create a path to the red chip with the correct amount of voltage.

Confusing? Well you'll get it once you start playing! There's an interactive tutorial just for you!

ProgrammingFlamingSparrowArtTeshia Bennett
MusicScowsh

Thanks for playing!
